login.subtitle: Please enter your credentials.

agentView.title: Agent Interface
agentView.noScript: This campaign has no associated script.
agentView.scriptWillBeHere: The script will be displayed here.

users.title: Users
users.description: Manage user accounts, their roles, and permissions.

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: Create agent groups for simplified management and routing.

planning.title: Schedules
planning.description: Create and manage weekly agent schedules and their activities.

outbound.title: Outbound Campaigns
outbound.description: Create and manage outbound call campaigns with advanced dialing strategies.

scripts.title: Agent Scripts
scripts.description: Build interactive call guides for your agents with a visual editor.

ivr.title: IVR Flows
ivr.description: Design complex inbound call flows with a graphical designer.

audio.title: Media Library
audio.description: Import and manage voice prompts for your IVRs and hold music.

records.title: Recordings
records.description: Listen, download, and archive call recordings for quality and compliance.

qualifications.title: Call Qualifications
qualifications.description: Define call-end statuses for reporting and retry strategies.

supervision.title: Real-Time Supervision
supervision.description: View your contact center's activity live and interact with agents.

reporting.title: Reports & Analytics
reporting.description: Explore historical data, create custom reports, and export results.

history.title: Call History
history.description: Consult, filter, and search the detailed log of all inbound and outbound calls.

sessions.title: Agent Login/Logout
sessions.description: Consult the detailed log of agent connections, disconnections, and work times.

trunks.title: SIP Trunks
trunks.description: Connect your telephone operators for inbound and outbound calls.

dids.title: Numbers (DIDs)
dids.description: Manage your incoming phone numbers and their initial routing.

sites-config.title: Site Configuration
sites-config.description: Manage different physical sites for outbound call routing.

module-settings.title: Module Management
module-settings.description: Enable or disable menus for Administrator and Supervisor roles.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Manage the languages available in the application.

database-client.title: Database
database-client.description: Execute SQL queries directly on the database for debugging and advanced reporting.

system-connection.title: System Connection
system-connection.description: Configure connections to the database and the Asterisk telephony server.

api-docs.title: API Documentation
api-docs.description: Consult the complete API documentation for integration and development.

billing.title: Billing
billing.description: Manage subscriptions and view billing history.

system-settings.title: System
system-settings.description: Configure low-level system settings, such as email sending.
